Title: Object: Marche dans le désert (Desert march)
Description: Scene from the Egyptian Campaign, with in the centre, Napoleon pointing the way forward to a group of infantrymen approaching from the right,following the cavalry, loaded camels and a horse-drawn gun-carriage advancing to left, while further back in the centre, a soldier holds Napoleon's white charger; pyramids in the distance. 1822 Lithograph
Curator's comments: According to Delteil, this print was published in A.V. Arnault,'Vie politique et militaire de Napoléon', Paris, 1822-1826.
Bibliographic references: Delteil / Le Peintre-Graveur Illustré (XIXe et XXe siècles) (43.II)
Associated names: Representation of: Napoléon I, Emperor of the French (Napoleon)
Associated titles: Vie politique et militaire de Napoléon
